title: Some genuine remains of the late pious and learned John Lightfoot, D.D. consisting of three tracts ... : together with a large preface concerning the author, his learned debates in the assembly of divines, his peculiar opinions, his Christian piety, and the faithful discharge of his ministry.
author: Lightfoot, John, 1602-1675.
publicationStmtPublisher: Printed by R.J. for J. Robinson ... and J. Wyat ...,
